main.description: Checks whether the provided handle is available. If the handle is not available, available suggestions will be returned. Optional inputs will be used to generate suggestions.

handle.description: Tentative handle. Will be checked for availability or used to build handle suggestions.

email.description: User-provided email. Might be used to build handle suggestions.

birthDate.description: User-provided birth date. Might be used to build handle suggestions.

resultAvailable.description: Indicates the provided handle is available.

resultUnavailable.description: Indicates the provided handle is unavailable and gives suggestions of available handles.

suggestions.description: List of suggested handles based on the provided inputs.

method.description: Method used to build this suggestion. Should be considered opaque to clients. Can be used for metrics.
